Sr Project Manager 2 - Virginia State Police

About the Company

The Virginia State Police is looking for a Project Manager with 10+ years of experience in the field.

Job Overview

A PM is needed to address and coordinate the replacement of the existing criminal history systems utilized by the Virginia State Police.

Location and Work Arrangement

Richmond, VA - In Person | Onsite

Key Responsibilities

  • Manage project scope, schedule, and budget.
  • Coordinate with Business Analysts and serve as the liaison between the business community/end users and the IT organization.
  • Assist in managing/coordinating a Request for Proposal (RFP) process.
  • Oversee vendor efforts on the design, development, and implementation of the solution.
  • Identify, analyze, track, and recommend actions to project issues.

Required Qualifications

  • Active Project Management Institute (PMI) Project Management Professional (PMP) certification REQUIRED.
  • Documented high-risk project management experience.
  • Completion of a Category 1 or 2 Commonwealth project of $5M or more, OR completion of non-COV project with a value greater than $10M as PM of record.

Preferred Qualifications

Not specified.

What We Offer

Not specified.

How to Apply

Interviews will be IN PERSON ONLY ON SITE 4-5 days a week REQUIRED.
